question.question: Why should people use the stairs?
question.feedback: Por favor use la escalera. El ascensor no funciona means “Please use the stairs. The elevator doesn’t work.”
question.distractor: Because the elevator is very small
Because the elevator doesn’t have air conditioning

question.question: Where is there water on the floor?
question.en_answer: There is water on the floor of the kitchen and bathroom.
question.feedback: ¡Cuidado, que hay agua en el piso de la cocina y el cuarto de baño. No sé de dónde sale! means "Watch out! There is water on the floor of the kitchen and bathroom. I do not know where it is coming from!"
question.distractor: There is water on the floor of the dining room and garage.
There is water on the floor of the kitchen and balcony.
There is water on the floor of the bathroom and patio.

question.question: What rooms need to be painted?
question.en_answer: The basement and dining room need a coat of paint.
question.hint: Necesitan una mano de pintura means "need a coat of paint".
question.feedback: Se necesita un pintor: mi sótano y mi comedor necesitan una mano de pintura. Llame al 01-553-0984 means "painter wanted: my basement and my dining room need a coat of paint. Call 01-553-0984."

question.question: What is for sale?
question.feedback: Para venta: Una silla y una cama. Mi teléfono es 01-590-3421 means "for sale: a chair and a bed. My telephone is 01-590-3421."

question.question: Why should students eat in the mess hall?
question.hint: The keyword in the first sentence can have two meanings.
question.feedback: La cocina no funciona. Por favor coma en el comedor means "The stove doesn't work. Please eat in the mess hall (dining room)."
